generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: Tall buildings with windows and architectural features are visible on both sides of the road, indicating urban structures.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the bicycles on the right sidewalk.
- car: A white car is visible on the left side of the road, and other cars can be seen further down the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the right sidewalk near the building.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow indicating a mandatory direction is visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible in the background, particularly on the left side of the road.
